course_title: Pediatric Primary Care Nurse Practitioner III
course_description: This course advances clinical nursing expertise for working with children with chronic illnesses/complex health problems in inpatient and ambulatory settings. Emphasis is on collaborative practice within the interdisciplinary team to provide high quality healthcare to children and their families.
prerequisites: NRSG 546 & 665 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 3025, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 10-11:50a, Instructor: S. Close, Status: Open
